note:
fotp = friend of the people

I'm fotp (pronounced fought-pea). My interests include design, startups, health, motorsports, cricket, and planes.

I'm here on Mastodon for the people. All the awesome folks here give me faith that the world is still full of kindness, gratitude, and positivity.

Profile picture is a sketch of myself. Black ink on a white background. Only my face. Short, slightly messy hair. Large, round glasses. Big smile.

Banner is handwritten font that reads "be kind".
